paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: All patients with BRCA1/2 mutations met the criteria for HBOCS.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with hereditary breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: All patients with BRCA1/2 mutations met the criteria for HBOCS.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on family history and clinical criteria.
variants.additional_notes: Two recurrent mutations, including c.2442delC, were identified in two unrelated patients.
key_quotes: Eighteen (18.2%) patients were found to carry BRCA1/2 germline mutations (7 in BRCA1 and 11 in BRCA2).
Based on their family history, all patients with BRCA1/2 mutations met the criteria for HBOCS.

tables_processed.table_caption: Features of the mutations, family characteristics, segregation analysis and age of diagnosis for each of the patients carrying a mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for BRCA2 variants were extracted from the main text and tables.
